description: Number of polyominoids containing n squares: these are 2-dimensional polyominoes in a three-dimensional grid (edge-connected squares, like the floors, ceilings and walls of a building).
references: R. A. Epstein, The Theory of Gambling and Statistical Logic, 1977, Academic Press, ISBN 0-12-240760-1 (pages 362-369 discuss polyforms, including Epstein's polyominoids).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _James A. Sellers_, Aug 28 2000
extensions: Corrected and extended by _Joseph Myers_, Sep 24 2002
